description: This course focuses on how to gamify your instruction. Gamification refers to applying principles of video games to how you teach. This course is intended for people who have little to no knowledge about how to gamify their instruction or are unsure how to start. You will learn the principles necessary to create a foundation that supports gamifing your instruction such as creating quests and how to grade them. You will also learn some more advanced techniques such as how to use badges and create an item shop. This course can be completed within a week, but the ideas may take longer to implement.
title: Game On! Principles of Gaming Your Instruction
